name: T.A.N.K - The Prototype
description:
A Game in Progress, made by a group of 3 Students as a school project!

This Game is entirely made in Java, by using Eclipse.

It's a local-coop Tank game, where you have to beat your friend (or enemy in that case), by shooting giant bullets at his tank! The first to have a completely red health bar loses. But be aware, that a Tank isn't stationary! Move around to make your opponent sweat, when he has to adjust his shooting angle as well as his power!

Controls:

Use A and D to Move as long as you have a Fuel in your orange bar.

Use the left and right Arrow keys to adjust the angle.

-> The angle influences the range immense, it reaches from about 45 degrees(0) to 67.25 degrees(100)

Use the up and down Arrow keys to adjust the strength.

-> The strength is for slight adjustments after you adjusted your angle. It doesn't influence the range as hard as the angle
